name: Greedland
description:
Introducing Greedland: A Top-Down Shooter for Fans of "Vampire Survivors" and Beyond
EPIC BATTLES WITH MASSIVE ENEMY WAVES
Powered by Unreal Engine 5, "Greedland" delivers finely crafted enemies that swarm you from every direction, igniting an adrenaline-fueled gaming experience that tests your boundary of sanity.

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE WARRIOR

Unlock a vast array of potent weapons and skills to create satisfying build and relive the thrill of classic games like "Alien Shooter" and "Crimsonland".


EXPLORE A MONSTROUS ARSENAL


Arm youself with the most ferocious the Galaxy can provide along with a long list of skills. The life of a mercenary offering endless strategic possibilities. Powerful mechs are in the furture updates!

DIVERSE MAPS AND CHALLENGING FOES

Experience three distinct maps, each with unique enemy combinations and varying difficulty levels, including formidable boss battles.

CONTINUOUSLY EXPANDING CONTENT

The game has already provided three challenging maps, each with a unique combination of enemies and powerful BOSS to challenge. As the game continues to be updated, you will encounter more new maps, new game modes, and a four-player co-op mode, making your adventure more diverse.






Add Greedland to your wishlist now and stay tuned for exciting updates and fresh content. Immerse yourself in a thrilling top-down shooter adventure like no other!
Progress from Next Feast demo will be inheirited to the retail version.
